verses.text: Mamin Jehová, ab' in lesal, cham val ab'an tas svala'. Tak'vanh d'ayin, ina to te tojol ach, tzak'annhejelk'och tas tzala'.
Manh a k'anb'ej tas vaj a in a checab' in tic, yujto malaj junoc mach vach' yaj d'a a sat.
Ix in pechji b'eyek' yuj eb' ayoch ajk'olal d'ayin, ix in stek'anem eb' d'a sat luum. Ix in yak' cajnaj eb' d'a scal q'uik'alq'uinal, icha val yaj eb' chamnacxo.
Manhxo animaoc vaj ticnaic svab'i, te somchajnac in k'ool.
Tzin nacot juntzanh k'ual ek'nac d'a peca', tzin naub'tanhan masanil tas a b'onac d'a yalanhtax chi'.
A d'ayach tzin mojb'ejq'ue in k'ab', tzach in nib'ej val, icha val junoc lum taquinh luum snib'an a a'.
Mamin Jehová, tak'vanh d'ayin d'a elanhchamel, toxo val tz'el in k'ol svab'i. Manh a yaej a colval d'ayin. Icha val eb' chamnac smucchajemi, icham chi' ol in ajoc tato tza yaej a colval d'ayin.
Ak' in nacot a vach'k'olal d'a junjun q'uinhib'alil, ina to a ach tzach vak'och yipoc in k'ool. Ch'ox d'ayin tas ol aj in b'eyb'ati, yujto van in lesalvi d'ayach.
Mamin Jehová, colinel d'a yol sk'ab' eb' ajk'ool, yujto a d'ayach tzin say in colnab'il.
k'ayb'ej in yic tzin b'o icha tas tza nib'ej, yujto in Diosal ach. Aocab' Espíritu vach' tzin ik'an b'ey d'a a vach' b'eyb'al.
Mamin, manh in a cha chamoc, yic vach' max alchaj chucal lolonel d'ayach. Ik' in elta d'a scal vilk'olal, yujto vach' ach toni.
Yuj a vach'k'olal d'ayin, yuj chi' tza satcanel masanil eb' ayoch ajk'olal d'ayin, yujto a checab' in.
